page.title: 06Richmond. Piano lessons.
page.content: On Saturday at 9.00 I go to piano lessons.A piano is a musical instrument; that if you press a button down a small hammer hits a chord.On 25/6/85 I am taking my grade 1. It will be very hard . I am on grade 2 theory. My music teacher is called Mrs Baily.I am playing Melodie by Felix Le Copey. Also I am playing Longing from I begin to play. I am also playing Les Chloches (Pronounced Le cloch, ) From Les chants ex juex;(Les chloches means the bells .)If you want to play the left hand of Les cloches; it is :C B A G (all the way through.) the right hand is C D E F G,A semibreive followed by 3 Crochets and you have the first line.
